resources:
JoozdLog Joozdlog Pilot\'s Logbook PILOT LOGBOOK Holder\'s name(s) Holder\'s licence number HOLDER\'S ADDRESS: Yes No App Link intent Filter FlightNumber Date Airport Name Aircraft Search Search(%1$d Flights) %1$d Flights Search Type Continue Back Skip Retry Hint Clear Add Flight Edit Flight Destination Origin Time Out Time In Name PIC Other names Remarks Simulator Time PICUS Simulator PIC Save MP IFR Dual Instructor Dual/Instr Username Email Email saved Your email address has been saved and a confirmation mail will be sent. Please check your inbox on this device, and open the provided confirmation link with Joozdlog. Email address Not an email address No email address has been found, but one is needed for automatic backup emails. Please enter it in Settings. The server did not like the entered email address for a scheduled action that requires one. Please enter it again in Settings. The server reported that your entered email address is not verified.\nPlease update your email address in Settings to get a new verification mail. Enter email %1$s (verified) %1$s (not verified) The entered email is the same as the currently saved email. Do you want to re-confirm your email address? Please enter your email for backup and account recovery purposes.\nYour email address will not be stored outside your phone. Auto Values Takeoff day night departure arrival alt: %1$s\' Landing Autoland Total Times Edit Aircraft Unknown Unknown Airport Co-pilot Paper Logbook Search Names Name Add This Remove last Select Search Airports Set This Times Times / Functions Augmented crew Crew Size Reduce crew Reduce crew Landing in seat In seat Time for TO/LDG DUAL Augmented Saved flight Deleted flight Undo Redo New Flight Registration Registrations Signature PF Sim Sign Save to PDF> Joozdlog Flights Synchronized with Cloud SearchAircraft Loading Aircraft and Airports Database Sign in Password "••••••••" New User Landings Takeoffs/Landings ➔ Settings Transfer Data Do Something Error An error %1$d has occurred. Please let Joozd know though the "Feedback" menu option.\n\nError description:\n%2$s Never Always Once Warning Ignore for 1 day Verify TBD Times per year Last 12 Months Times per type Times per registration Arrivals per airport Log In INSTRUCTOR Done! Create cloud sync account Almost done! Working… You are entering a custom airport. If you do not enter lat/long coordinates (TODO: NOT IMPLEMENTED IN THIS VERSION), automatic night time errors might occur.\n(You are reminded in Edit Flight screen by (!) next to airport identifier) Airport location unknown, no night time logged. File not found An error occurred while retreiving the file you are trying to import. Unknown File The file you are trying to import into Joozdlog is not supported. If you want it to be, please mail it (or preferably a few) to joozdlog@joozd.nl and I might support it in a future version. Fatal error when parsing file. This is a bug. Please send the file to joozdlog@joozd.nl so it can be fixed. Error importing file: bad_intent_error Error saving flights, could not get flights to save from file. Unknown Link This link is unknown or contains bad data. Please check the link and try again. Total time cannot be more than off blocks to on blocks Could not parse total time Error creating new user: error 0001. This error is not expected to occur. Please inform Joozd though the "feedback" menu. Cannot connect to server You need an internet connection for this. Cannot connect to server The server cannot be reached. It may be down, or your internet may have problems. Please try again later. The server returned bad data. Please try again later and consider sending a bug report through the "feedback" menu, describing what you were trying to do. Login Error Changed login link Your login link has changed. Please send your login link to yourself to make sure it is saved. Your password was just changed. Your password was just changed. Do you really mean to change it again? Send it to myself Pick an app: Verifying email Your email verification has been scheduled. If you are connected to the internet this should happen pretty fast, otherwise it will be the next time your device connects to the internet. Data has been merged. You logged in to an existing Cloud account while some flights were present on the device. The data has been merged with the stored data on the server, and saved both locally and on the server. The server rejected your login data. Cloud functions have been disabled. Use a valid login link or create a new Cloud account in Settings to enable it again. No login data was found when trying to perform a scheduled Cloud function. Cloud functions have been disabled. Use a valid login link or create a new Cloud account in Settings to enable it again. Waiting for server Created account %1$s. A login link has been placed on your clipboard. Paste it into an email or text message to send it to yourself!\nYou can also create a login link from the settings menu. I strongly suggest you do as it\'s your only way in if you lose your phone! No internet connection available. You can create and account in the settings screen when you have one, or you can connect to the internet now and retry. Server seems to be unavailable. Please retry to create an account at a later time via the settings menu. Your login data has been stored! Password cannot be empty Username cannot be empty Does not match The server has rejected your login data. Please create a new cloud account or find your working login link. The server has rejected your email confirmation data. Please check you clicked the correct confirmation link. The server has rejected your email address. You might have clicked an old confirmation message. Do you want to request a new confirmation mail, or delete your current email settings? Password requirements At least 6 characters, two of which are not the same. Password does not meet standards. It needs a length of at least 6 and at least 2 different characters. Password does not meet standards. This username is already taken. If this is you, use your login link if you have it, or create a new account. Change email No email No working email address was entered, but a request for something needing an email address was scheduled. Please enter your email address in Settings. No working email address was entered, so no login link will be emailed to you. Your.Address@example.com I don\'t care I understand This username exists, and you have entered the correct password for it. If this is not you, please pick another username and a more secure password. If your login is still working on this device, you can change it to something you catually can remember via the settings screen, or you can generate a login link. Use this Ignore Calendar Sync conflict You are editing a planned flight while calendar sync is enabled. This means some changes will be gone by next calendar sync.\nCalendar sync will be disabled until after this flight. You can re-enable it in the Setting menu. You are trying to delete a COMPLETED flight. This might be illegal. Delete anyway? You are deleting a a flight from your calendar.\nCalendar sync will be disabled until after this flight. You can re-enable it in the Setting menu. You can start calendar synchronizing again by re-enabling it in the Settings menu Always postpone on manual import Postpone sync Now using IATA airport codes Now using ICAO airport codes Get planned flights from your device\'s calendar Use Calendar Sync Calendar Sync Welcome to Joozdlog 1.1 The next few screens will allow you to set some preferences and make a Cloud account if you want to.\n\nAll this will take under a minute, and after that you are all set to start logging (or importing) your flights!\n\nIf you have any feedback or bugreports, the main menu has a Feedback function. Feedback is appreciated! If you are upgrading from version 1.0: You see this dialog because the whole settings system has been vastly upgraded and all old preferences are deleted in the process. Sync your data to the cloud!\nThis is not a backup, read terms&conditions.\nInactive accounts can be removed. Read Terms&Conditions Accept Terms&Conditions If you already have a cloud account, you can leave this unchecked and use your login link after all settings are done! If you want to adjust any more settings (switching on automatic backup emails for example), take a look at the Settings menu after you click \"done\"! Edit Flight You can edit your flights here. The triangles are buttons, click them to see what they do!\nYou can long-press any field to see if it offers any help. Permission needed. Joozdlog needs permission to access calendars if you want it to access your calendars. No iCalendar link found. Please save the link to your iCal calendar on your clipboard (usually long-press and select "copy URL")\nCurrently only KLM Ical links are supported. iCalendar link found. Your clipboard seems to be holding an iCalendar link. Do you wish to use this? The date of this flight, in UTC. If your flight spans across multiple days, enter the date of departure. The date of this simulator entry, in UTC. If your simulator entry spans across multiple days, enter the date at which the entry starts. The flightnumber of this flight. Not required, will not end up in pdf logbook. The place of departure. You can enter ICAO and IATA identifiers such as EHGG, GRQ or E25 The place of arrival. You can enter ICAO and IATA identifiers such as EHGG, GRQ or E25 The time of departure, in UTC. You can enter times like 0103, 22:33 or 12 which wil become 00:12Z The time of arrival, in UTC. If earlier than Time Out, it will be read on the next day. The duration of this simulator session. You can enter times like 0130, 01:30 or 90. Times longer than 99 minutes must be in hours+minutes, eg. 330 or 3:30. The aircraft used on this flight. You can enter partial registrations such as XO if you mean PH-EXO. It will take the top hit in the drop-down list that will appear after entering 2 letters.\nIf the registration is not known by you or the server, you will get to a dialog where you can assign a type to this registration. The type of aircraft of this simulator. For example B733 or FNPT2. This will not be checked against Aircraft Database. Takeoffs and landings. Enter for example 1 for 1 takeoff/landing, or 2/0 if you did 2 takeoffs and 0 landings. This field can be used to keep track of things like autolands or landings, if needed for recency. Will not show up in PDF logbook. Name of the PIC, required by EASA-FCL. Names of other crew members. Not required.\nYou can enter multiple names, separated by semicolons. Names of people. Not required, will not end up in PDF logbook. Remarks. Will end up in PDF logbook. Select if this is a simulator session. Select if you want a signature in your pdf logbook. Select if this is a dual instruction flight. Select if you want to log this flight as DUAL or INSTRUCTOR. Select if this you want to log this flight as instructor. Select if this was a multi-pilot flight.\nAuto-set from aircraft type if AutoValues is on. Select if this flight was conducted under IFR. Select if you are pilot in command or PICUS on this flight. There is no distinction between those in an EASA-FCL logbook. Select if you were pilot flying on this flight. If this box is ticked, IFR and night times will be automatically calculated from other inserted data. Add Balance Forward Name of old logbook Multipilot time Total time Total time of flight Day ldg Night ldg Night time IFR time PIC (+ PICUS) Co-pilot time Dual time Instructor time Balance Forward Building PDF… Ready to save PDF Saving PDF… PDF Saved You are loading a roster file, but calendar sync is enabled. Do you want to disable calendar sync until end of this roster? Due to reasons, a backup can only be loaded onto a fresh install (or at least an install with no unplanned flights in it). This is on the list to be fixed in a future update. Please remove and reinstall app and try again. Waiting for data… Receiving data Reading file Extracting flights Cleaning logbook Saving flights Imported Complete Flights Imported %1$d flights.\n%2$d flights were updated.\n%3$d imported flights did not match any in current logbook.\n%4$d flights in current logbook did not match any imported flights. Your overview was imported, but %1$d conflicting flights were already in your logbook. Please check the period for which you just imported an overview for correct data! Planned flights found Your overview was imported, but %1$d planned flights are still in your logbook. Please check the period for which you just imported an overview for correct data! Conflicts found Your overview was imported, but %1$d conflicting flights and %2$d planned flights are still in your logbook. Please check the period for which you just imported an overview for correct data! Importing complete logbook Do you want to delete and replace your current logbook, or merge it? Are you sure? This will replace your entire logbook. Please make sure you really want this, and always have a backup of your current data! This will place all imported flights into your logbook, and might not be undoable. Please make sure you really want this, and always have a backup of your current data! Replace or merge? Do you want to replace all flights by incoming flights, or merge them? Replace Merge You are importing a complete logbook. Do you want to automatically calculate missing values such as night- or multi-pilot times? No airport DB was downloaded, and none could be found. Please check if your device is connected to the internet and try again. Downloading airports DB… XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Repeat password Already have an account? Sign in Sign out Don\'t forget to save your new login link! Make a new account You do not have valid login data. Do you want to create a new account?\nIf you have a valid login link, click \"NO\" and use your login link to log in. Skip this step Don\'t want to use cloud sync? Create new account You are signed in as %1$s. Your login credentials arer no longer valid. You can use your login link, or make a new account in the Settings menu. No email address provided You need to be signed in before you can perform this action. I accept the terms and conditions You must accept the terms and conditions to use Cloud Sync Don\'t lose your password. You cannot restore it. Cloud Sync terms About Joozdlog What\'s New Don\'t use Calendar Import You can automatically import flights into your logbook. The planned flights in Joozdlog will be synced to the calendar you pick. You can import flights from your device\'s calendar. This will look for entries like \"KL1234 AMS-LCY\" in whatever calendar you pick. Apart from these entries, none of your calendar contents are being saved or transmitted. Do you want to enable this? Use Calendar Import Calendar on this device Disabled iCalendar link Accept terms Only use WiFi for larger files Add remark when Monthly Overview has changes Add names to flights if found Disabled until %1$s %1$s days Enable now Import settings Monthly Overviews, rosters and check-in sheets import supported for selected carriers (currently only KLC/KLM) only. Just share your PDF/CSV/TXT with Joozdlog. General preferences pertaining to (automatic) logging and times. Use Aircraft Consensus Data JoozdLog Cloud collects (anonymous) Aircraft Registration and type data so you don\'t have to enter aircraft types that somebody else already entered. Typical collected data would be \"4 users said PH-XXX is a Cessna 172\". Switching this off will stop sending and receiving this data. Do you want to display airports in ICAO (4 letter) or as IATA (3 letter) format? PIC name required If no PIC name is set on a completed flight, flight will be marked as incomplete Joozdlog Cloud ID
%1$s  Email address
%1$s  Email address
%1$s (not verified)  Server replied you are not signed in during an operation that requires you to sign in. This most probably means you encountered a bug. Please tell Joozd what you were trying to do via the Feedback menu. Augmented Crew takeoff/landing time
%1$s minutes  Remove duplicate flights from DB No duplicate flights found. %1$d duplicate flights have been removed. %1$d duplicate flights have been removed.\nThey will also be removed from Cloud.\nHowever, to prevent them re-appearing again, remove duplicates or disable cloud syncing on any other devices you use Joozdlog on as well, or they will come back. Remind me to make a backup every
%1$s  Auto-send backup emails Your new login link will be sent to
%1$s  An email with your logbook will be emailed to you at the same interval as you get reminded to make a backup. You will still be reminded if server cannot be reached. Cloud Backup Disable Backup now Exporting CSV file… Pick backup interval In case of an augmented crew (3 or more pilots), Joozdlog calculates the time that can be logged for copilots by subtracting this amount of time for each takeoff and landing, allocating the remaining time evenly over the pilots, then adds this time again for every takeoff/landing performed in the pilot\'s seat. Default value is 30 (10 minutes taxi, 20 minutes after takeoff/before landing) Change Login Link Copy login link Login link copied to clipboard! Joozdlog Login Link This will create a login link that you can paste in your favorite app (email, sms, notepad, anywhere). If you click that link, it will try to log you in with the username/password currently set on this device. You can use this screen to change your password when you think your login link might have been compromised. A new login link will be created for you to save in your favorite app. ChangePass error 1: No login stored while changing login link. This should not happen. Sorry. Best make a new cloud account and pretend this never happened. New Password General Preferences Backup Preferences You should periodically backup your logbook. Not Implemented This operation is not implemented yet. Nothing will happen now. New Cloud account made A new Cloud account has been created. If and email address was saved, an email with a login link will be mailed to you. In any case, I recommend you send a login link to yourself now. Share link •••••••••• No backup of logbook has been remembered. You have not backed up your logbook for %1$d days. Send a periodic email to yourself from the cloud. Your email address is not saved on the server, so backups will be initiated from this device (and stop if you uninstall or kill the app, they should run with the app in the background). Please enter your email address here. It is only used to help you keep access to your data.\nYour email address will not be saved outside your device. You can give any feedback you have to Joozdlog here. I would especially be happy to read things that nag you when using the app, feature requests or compliments. Check known issues/plans here Feedback Optional contact info (phone/email/etc) Submitting Feedback Your feedback will be submitted. Thank you for helping me make this app even better! All feedback will be read, and I will do my best to answer but I might be too busy/lazy. Privacy All text entered in this screen will end up in an email to me and may be stored in my inbox until I delete it manually. It will not be saved anywehere else, and nothing will be used for any other purpose than processing/answering your feedback. You can also send an email Email deleted Your email address has been deleted from this device. Email address verified! Verification Mail A verification email will be requested from the Joozdlog Server. Please verify the mail on this device! The email verification data received is not valid. Do you want to request new email verification data? An email verification was scheduled but no code was saved. Please report this through the Feedback option in the menu and tell me what you did, so I can fix this bug. Logged in. No server, will try again This is a test message! Submit Submit feedback? Feedback is empty You cannot submit empty feedback. Issues / TODO Use Dark mode When printing logbook, make sure you make the printer fit it to printable area as the PDF does not have margins. Help Joozdlog Importer confirm delete share Joozdlog Logo PLACEHOLDER_TEXT Send Receive QR code WORK IN PROGRESS\nThis is still work in progress, as you can see by the \"minimalistic\" design.\nIt is working, but needs an internet connection to send the data. Use fixed rest time Rest time
